name: Project: Husk
description:
Take control of an enigmatic Doctor, trapped in their own maze-like lab with a bloodthirsty husk. With the only weapon in sight stolen by the shadowy clone, the Doctor's only option is to run, and fast. Can you guide the Doctor out of the building before their scientific hubris catches up with them?

-----

Controls:

Arrow keys OR WASD -  Move left and right. Players can move freely in the air horizontally.

Spacebar OR K -  Jump. Players have one air jump aside from their ground jump. Jumps recharge after hitting the ground.

X OR L -  Dash. Air and ground OK, recharges 1 second after last use.

Hold left or right towards a nearby wall to cling to it.   
- Players can cling onto a wall for up to 1.5 seconds before they fall. In this state, players have access to a special jump.  
- Players can press jump during a Wall Cling to perform a special Wall Jump, even if they have already used their air jump.

` (Backquote) - Pauses the game

-----

Developed for UW-Stout's Two Dimensional Game Design course.
Artists: Chloe Ferguson, Anna Kopplin
Programmers: Tyler Garcia, Vincent Lubasi, Micah Weltzin
Audio Designers: Tyberius Livingston, Hannah Byers, Reece Parsons
